item.title: Altice International 因实验室和外汇问题下调盈利展望
item.description: 由于帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）陷入困境的电信帝国部分业务持续恶化，Altice International 下调了今年的盈利展望。【原文：Altice International lowered its earnings outlook for the year as Patrick Drahi’s embattled telecommunications empire continued to see parts of the business deteriorate.】

item.title: 德意志银行完成出售价值 10 亿美元的房地产贷款组合
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已完成处置近 10 亿美元与美国商业房地产相关的贷款，从而减少了对这一资产类别的风险敞口。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has completed the disposal of close to $1 billion in loans linked to US commercial real estate, reducing its exposure to an asset class that had weighed on the business.】

item.title: 受消费支出拉动，美国国内生产总值稳健增长 2.8
item.description: 美国经济在第三季度稳健增长，主要得益于消费者支出的广泛增长，而通胀则继续降温。【原文：The US economy expanded at a solid pace in the third quarter, largely powered by a broad-based advance in consumer spending as inflation continued to cool.】

item.title: 瑞银集团在瑞士信贷洗钱刑事案件中被判无罪
item.description: 瑞士信贷银行 2022 年因未能阻止为可卡因毒贩的利润洗钱而被定罪，但瑞士上诉法院在该案中一名被判有罪的前雇员死亡后推翻了这一定罪。【原文：Credit Suisse’s 2022 conviction for failing to prevent the money laundering of a cocaine dealer’s profits was overturned by a Swiss appeals court following the death of one of its former employees who was found guilty in the case.】

item.title: 交易泰斗唐-威尔逊（Don Wilson）说，是时候摆脱证交会了
item.description: 在与美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）和美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）旷日持久的斗争之后，全球最大交易公司之一的负责人表示，是时候重新思考整个美国证券行业的监管框架了。【原文：After protracted battles with the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, the head of one of the world’s biggest trading firms says its time to rethink the entire US securities industry regulatory framework.】

item.title: Grifols 交易失败，银行错失 2.2 亿欧元债务费
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）表示放弃将制药商 Grifols 私有化的竞标后，银行将损失约 2.2 亿欧元（2.32 亿美元）的承销费。【原文：Banks are losing out on about €220 million ($232 million) in underwriting fees after Brookfield Asset Management said it was abandoning its bid to take drug-maker Grifols private.】

item.title: 电池制造商莫罗要求挪威就贷款的成败作出裁决
item.description: 挪威莫罗电池公司（Morrow Batteries AS）正面临着生存危机，因为该公司正等待政府资金的批准，而政府资金对于吸引投资者至关重要。【原文：Norway’s Morrow Batteries AS is facing an existential crisis as it awaits approval of government funds vital to attracting investors in an industry scarred by the collapse of Swedish startup Northvolt AB.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德撤回 68 亿美元收购制药商 Grifols 的要约
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）放弃了收购 Grifols SA 的计划，结束了数月来关于收购这家西班牙血浆公司的谈判。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. walked away from a plan to acquire Grifols SA, ending months of negotiations to take over the Spanish blood-plasma company.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气买家急于寻找美国制裁的变通办法
item.description:
欧洲从俄罗斯获取天然气并支付费用的方式正在发生变化。【原文：

The tectonic plates of how Europe gets and pays for gas from Russia are moving.

】

item.title: 尼日利亚加息令分析师认为紧缩政策将结束
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行周二谨慎地上调了利率，并对通货膨胀发出了乐观的信息，这让一些经济学家预测其前所未有的两年紧缩周期已经结束。【原文：The Central Bank of Nigeria’s cautious interest rate hike on Tuesday and optimistic messaging on inflation has some economists predicting its unprecedented two-year tightening cycle is over.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计贸易战将导致人民币贬值 10-15
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：China could allow its yuan to depreciate by as much as 10-15% in response to any trade wars unleashed by President-elect Donald Trump, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮让气候初创企业亟需动力
item.description:
数据中心的巨大需求意味着新兴的清洁技术产业正努力确保其所需的能源。【原文：

Data centers’ voracious demand means emerging clean-tech industries are struggling to secure the energy they need.

】

item.title: 软银寻求从员工手中购买 15 亿美元的 OpenAI 股票
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. aims to increase its stake in OpenAI by acquiring up to $1.5 billion in shares from the startup’s employees, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 从伦敦金属交易所仓库提取金属的订单激增，锌价上涨
item.description: 由于从伦敦金属交易所仓库提取库存的订单创下七年多来的最高纪录，锌的涨势延续到第三个交易日。【原文：Zinc extended gains into a third session as orders to withdraw stockpiles from London Metal Exchange warehouses hit the highest in more than seven years.】

item.title: 马斯克在推特上的裁员说明了他对美国政府的策略
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克即将 "推特化 "美国政府，但首先...【原文：Elon Musk is about to “Twitterize” the US government, but first...】

item.title: 特朗普首次威胁加征关税表明这不仅与经济有关
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们将探讨当选总统关税威胁背后的意图。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the intentions behind the president-elect’s tariff threat. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁将考验欧洲的强硬贸易政策
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普最近威胁要对美国的朋友和敌人都征收关税，这可能会让欧盟的新贸易权力面临考验。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump’s latest threats to impose US tariffs on friends and foes alike may put the European Union’s new trade powers to the test.】

item.title: 美国购房申请升至 2 月以来最高点
item.description: 美国购房抵押贷款申请量激增，达到 2 月份以来的最高水平，原因是购房者抓住了借贷成本小幅下降和市场上房屋选择增多的机会。【原文：A gauge of US mortgage applications for home purchases surged to the highest level since February as buyers seized on a small dip in borrowing costs and a greater selection of houses on the market.】

item.title: 南非展望上调使 Eskom 公司债券风险降低
item.description: 南非国有电力公司有政府担保的美元债券与无政府担保的美元债券相比，溢价已收窄至 2018 年开始交易以来的最低水平。【原文：The premium on South Africa’s state-owned power utility’s dollar bonds with government guarantees compared with those without has narrowed to its lowest level since the securities began trading in 2018.】

item.title: 摩根大通策略师认为美国股市将扩大全球主导地位
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The dominance of US equities over the rest of the world is unlikely to abate unless geopolitical and trade policy risks fade, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 咖啡价格更贵，期货价格升至 1977 年以来最高点
item.description: 由于全球供应忧虑占据主导地位，咖啡期货在纽约延续了大幅上涨的势头，推动价格达到四十多年来的最高点。【原文：Coffee futures extended their rampant rally in New York as global supply worries dominate, propelling prices to the highest in more than four decades.】

item.title: 从法国到美国，市场正陷入政治泥潭
item.description: 在经历了一年的选举之后，这些选票所产生的政策将决定未来几个月的走势。大选结束四个月后，法国和德国 10 年期国债收益率的差距达到了 2012 年欧元区债务危机以来的最高点。花旗集团（Citigroup）分析师称，这一利差可能达到整整一个百分点，高于今天上午的约0.8个百分点。【原文：After a year of elections, the coming months are set to be shaped by the policies wrought by those votes.Take France. Four months after snap elections, the gap between French and German 10-year government bond yields is around the highest since the euro-area debt crisis of 2012. Citigroup analysts say the spread could reach a full percentage point, up from about 0.8 of a point this morning.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯为经济增长制定 "设计赤字 "政策
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯预计未来几年将出现预算赤字，以此换取投资，确保非石油部门的长期利益。【原文：Saudi Arabia is expecting to run budget deficits in coming years as a trade off for investing in ways to secure long-term benefits for the non-oil sector.】

item.title: 据说 BPCE 旗下的 Primus 银行计划出售剩余的西班牙贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Banco Primus SA 计划出售其在西班牙的全部贷款组合，并正在权衡其在西班牙市场的业务选择。【原文：Banco Primus SA plans to sell its entire loan portfolio in Spain and is weighing its options about its presence in the Spanish market, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 在火热的信贷市场，简单的固定期限基金正蓬勃发展
item.description: 受近 20 年来最紧缩利差的挤压，信贷投资者正在选择最简单的策略，这为欧洲的固定期限基金带来了繁荣。【原文：Credit investors squeezed by the tightest spreads in almost 20 years are opting for bare-bones strategies, creating a boom for Europe’s fixed-maturity funds.】

item.title: 阿联酋石油巨头计划成立独立的低碳能源和化工公司
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国最大的石油生产商将成立一家投资公司，以发展其国际天然气、化工和低碳能源业务。【原文：The biggest oil producer in the United Arab Emirates will form an investment company to develop its international natural gas, chemicals and low-carbon energy operations.】

item.title: BPM 银行首席执行官警告称，联合信贷银行的交易可能危及 6,000 个工作岗位
item.description: Banco BPM SpA 首席执行官朱塞佩-卡斯塔格纳（Giuseppe Castagna）警告员工说，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的收购要约可能导致意大利第三大银行裁员 6000 多人。【原文：Banco BPM SpA Chief Executive Officer Giuseppe Castagna warned employees that a takeover bid by UniCredit SpA could lead to more than 6,000 job cuts at Italy’s third-largest bank.】

item.title: 火鸡价格下降，但美国人正在缩减感恩节宴席
item.description:
即使美国饲养的禽类数量减少，价格也在下降

。【原文：

Prices are falling even as fewer birds are being raised in the US

】

item.title: 押注米莱，阿根廷投资者选择长期投资：休克疗法
item.description: 阿根廷人正在延长比索储蓄和投资的期限，这表明他们对哈维尔-米莱伊总统降低通货膨胀和保持汇率稳定的能力充满信心。【原文：Argentines are extending the duration of their peso savings and investments, signaling confidence in President Javier Milei’s ability to reduce inflation and keep the exchange rate stable.】

item.title: 政府担忧加剧，法国债券利差再次扩大
item.description: 一项衡量法国债券风险的指标连续第八天上升，达到欧洲主权债务危机以来最宽的水平，人们越来越担心法国政府将难以在下个月可能举行的不信任投票中幸存下来。【原文：A measure of French bond risk rose for an eighth day to the widest level since the European sovereign debt crisis, amid mounting concerns the government will struggle to survive a possible no-confidence vote next month.】
